title: Brown v. Board of Education National Historic Site: People
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     People               People       The collection of cases included in the Brown v. Board of Education decision was the culmination of years of legal groundwork laid by the National Association for the Advancement of Colored People (NAACP) in its work to end segregation. None of the cases would have been possible without individuals who were courageous enough to take a stand against the segregated system.  Click on the links below to learn more about these people. Attorneys Plaintiffs Justices
